AssociateAdminAccount.name: AssociateAdminAccount
AssociateAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to set the AWS Firewall Manager administrator account and enables the service in all organization accounts

AssociateThirdPartyFirewall.name: AssociateThirdPartyFirewall
AssociateThirdPartyFirewall.description: Grants permission to set the Firewall Manager administrator as a tenant administrator of a third-party firewall service

BatchAssociateResource.name: BatchAssociateResource
BatchAssociateResource.description: Grants permission to associate resources to an AWS Firewall Manager resource set

BatchDisassociateResource.name: BatchDisassociateResource
BatchDisassociateResource.description: Grants permission to disassociate resources from an AWS Firewall Manager resource set

DeleteAppsList.name: DeleteAppsList
DeleteAppsList.description: Grants permission to permanently deletes an AWS Firewall Manager applications list

DeleteNotificationChannel.name: DeleteNotificationChannel
DeleteNotificationChannel.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Firewall Manager association with the IAM role and the Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) topic that is used to notify the FM administrator about major FM events and errors across the organization

DeletePolicy.name: DeletePolicy
DeletePolicy.description: Grants permission to permanently delete an AWS Firewall Manager policy

DeleteProtocolsList.name: DeleteProtocolsList
DeleteProtocolsList.description: Grants permission to permanently deletes an AWS Firewall Manager protocols list

DeleteResourceSet.name: DeleteResourceSet
DeleteResourceSet.description: Grants permission to permanently delete an AWS Firewall Manager resource set

DisassociateAdminAccount.name: DisassociateAdminAccount
DisassociateAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to disassociate the account that has been set as the AWS Firewall Manager administrator account and and disables the service in all organization accounts

DisassociateThirdPartyFirewall.name: DisassociateThirdPartyFirewall
DisassociateThirdPartyFirewall.description: Grants permission to disassociate a Firewall Manager administrator from a third-party firewall tenant

GetAdminAccount.name: GetAdminAccount
GetAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to return the AWS Organizations account that is associated with AWS Firewall Manager as the AWS Firewall Manager administrator

GetAdminScope.name: GetAdminScope
GetAdminScope.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified account's administrative scope

GetAppsList.name: GetAppsList
GetAppsList.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified AWS Firewall Manager applications list

GetComplianceDetail.name: GetComplianceDetail
GetComplianceDetail.description: Grants permission to retrieve detailed compliance information about the specified member account. Details include resources that are in and out of compliance with the specified policy

GetNotificationChannel.name: GetNotificationChannel
GetNotificationChannel.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) topic that is used to record AWS Firewall Manager SNS logs

GetPolicy.name: GetPolicy
GetPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified AWS Firewall Manager policy

GetProtectionStatus.name: GetProtectionStatus
GetProtectionStatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve policy-level attack summary information in the event of a potential DDoS attack

GetProtocolsList.name: GetProtocolsList
GetProtocolsList.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified AWS Firewall Manager protocols list

GetResourceSet.name: GetResourceSet
GetResourceSet.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified AWS Firewall Manager resource set

GetThirdPartyFirewallAssociationStatus.name: GetThirdPartyFirewallAssociationStatus
GetThirdPartyFirewallAssociationStatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve the onboarding status of a Firewall Manager administrator account to third-party firewall vendor tenant

GetViolationDetails.name: GetViolationDetails
GetViolationDetails.description: Grants permission to retrieve violations for a resource based on the specified AWS Firewall Manager policy and AWS account

ListAdminAccountsForOrganization.name: ListAdminAccountsForOrganization
ListAdminAccountsForOrganization.description: Grants permission to return a AdminAccounts object that lists the Firewall Manager administrators within the organization that are onboarded to Firewall Manager by AssociateAdminAccount

ListAdminsManagingAccount.name: ListAdminsManagingAccount
ListAdminsManagingAccount.description: Grants permission to list the accounts that are managing the specified AWS Organizations member account

ListAppsLists.name: ListAppsLists
ListAppsLists.description: Grants permission to return an array of AppsListDataSummary objects

ListComplianceStatus.name: ListComplianceStatus
ListComplianceStatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of PolicyComplianceStatus objects in the response. Use PolicyComplianceStatus to get a summary of which member accounts are protected by the specified policy

ListDiscoveredResources.name: ListDiscoveredResources
ListDiscoveredResources.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of resources in the organization's accounts that are available to be associated with a resource set

ListMemberAccounts.name: ListMemberAccounts
ListMemberAccounts.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of member account ids if the caller is FMS admin account

ListPolicies.name: ListPolicies
ListPolicies.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of PolicySummary objects in the response

ListProtocolsLists.name: ListProtocolsLists
ListProtocolsLists.description: Grants permission to return an array of ProtocolsListDataSummary objects

ListResourceSetResources.name: ListResourceSetResources
ListResourceSetResources.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of resources that are currently associated to a resource set

ListResourceSets.name: ListResourceSets
ListResourceSets.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of ResourceSetSummary objects

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list Tags for a given resource

ListThirdPartyFirewallFirewallPolicies.name: ListThirdPartyFirewallFirewallPolicies
ListThirdPartyFirewallFirewallPolicies.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all of the third-party firewall policies that are associated with the third-party firewall administrator's account

PutAdminAccount.name: PutAdminAccount
PutAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to create or update an Firewall Manager administrator account

PutAppsList.name: PutAppsList
PutAppsList.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Firewall Manager applications list

PutNotificationChannel.name: PutNotificationChannel
PutNotificationChannel.description: Grants permission to designate the IAM role and Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) topic that AWS Firewall Manager (FM) could use to notify the FM administrator about major FM events and errors across the organization

PutPolicy.name: PutPolicy
PutPolicy.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Firewall Manager policy

PutProtocolsList.name: PutProtocolsList
PutProtocolsList.description: Grants permission to creates an AWS Firewall Manager protocols list

PutResourceSet.name: PutResourceSet
PutResourceSet.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Firewall Manager resource set

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add a Tag to a given resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove a Tag from a given resource
